mechanized.translation[0].definitions[0]: a mechanized system or process now uses machines instead of people or animals
Car production is now highly mechanized.
mechanized.translation[0].definitions[1]: a mechanized army unit uses tanks and other armoured military vehicles
mechanized.translation[1].definitions[0]: a mechanized system or process now uses machines to do a lot of the work instead of people
Car production is now highly mechanized.
